survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with In-Home Smart Water Purification Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have installed smart water purification systems in their homes to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify common issues, and assess overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance of your smart water purification system?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your smart water purification system to others?
